questions.question_text: On the License Workbench, which of the following is defined as the “Estimated cost of remediating non-compliance”?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: E
True-up Cost - Estimated cost of remediating non-compliance

Selected Answer: E
The correct answer is E - True up cost.

it's on page 237 in the SAM book that comes with the course

questions.question_text: Automated license reconciliation keeps license positions accurate and up-to-date without manual calculations. Disregarding on-demand runs for a specific publisher or all publishers, how often does reconciliation run?

choices.B: Results for each license metric associated to the software model
choices.C: Results for all models and installations associated to the product
choices.D: Results for all license metrics related to the software model
choices.A: Results for all products and installations associated to the publisher

questions.question_text: When reconciliation is run, what information does the software product results display?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Verified in the Learning course in the Reconciliation section. When you flip the "Software product" tile it says verbatim: "Results for all models and installations associated to the product"

Selected Answer: C
C. All models and Installations associated to the product is the Software Product tier

Selected Answer: C
Software Product - Results for all models and installations associated to the product.
actually disregard I missread I think it is A

questions.question_text: When reconciliation is run, what information does the software publisher results display?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Verified in learning course. Similar to the previous question it is located in the reconciliation section of the course. When you flip the "Software Publisher" tile it says: "Results for all products and installations associated to the publisher"
A. Software publisher = Results for all products and installations associated to the publisher

Selected Answer: A
Software Publisher - Results for all products and installations associated to the publisher.

choices.C: Results for all models and installations associated to the product
choices.A: Results for all products and installations associated to the publisher
choices.B: Results for each license metric associated to the software model
choices.D: Results for all license metrics related to the software model

questions.question_text: What type of record is only created when a software model or entitlement exists for the product?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
A software model results record is only created when a software model or entitlement exists for the product.
